title: Introduction to Social Studies
description: Understanding citizenship, identity, and our role in society
description_zh: 了解公民身份、身份认同和我们在社会中的角色
objectives: Understand what it means to be a Singaporean
objectives_zh: 了解成为新加坡人的意义
探索国家认同和价值观

sections.title: Being Singaporean
sections.content: Singapore is a multicultural society with 4 official languages: English, Chinese, Malay, and Tamil. Our national values include meritocracy, racial and religious harmony, and resilience.
sections.content_zh: 新加坡是一个多元文化社会，拥有4种官方语言：英语、华语、马来语和淡米尔语。我们的国家价值观包括精英主义、种族和宗教和谐以及韧性。

sections.title: National Symbols
sections.content: National symbols include the Singapore Flag (red and white), National Anthem (Majulah Singapura), Lion and Merlion, and National Pledge.
sections.content_zh: 国家象征包括新加坡国旗（红白色）、国歌（Majulah Singapura）、狮子和鱼尾狮以及国家信约。

sections.title: Civic Responsibilities
sections.content: As citizens, we have responsibilities: obeying laws, paying taxes, serving National Service (for males), voting in elections, and contributing to society.
sections.content_zh: 作为公民，我们有责任：遵守法律、纳税、服兵役（男性）、在选举中投票以及为社会做贡献。

exercises.question: How many official languages does Singapore have?
exercises.question_zh: 新加坡有多少种官方语言？
exercises.explanation: Singapore has 4 official languages: English, Chinese, Malay, and Tamil
exercises.explanation_zh: 新加坡有4种官方语言：英语、华语、马来语和淡米尔语
